name: BOXiGON!
description:
WELCOME to the Original~BOXiGON!
3D-PUZZLES hand-crafted by the Wizard Envolveron for you!
Practice your color sorting abilities to BOXiGON~MASTER!
Can you unlock the BOX?

FEATURES:
~ 4 SKILL-LEVELS:
- NEWB, WIZ, PRO, MASTER.
~ 8 PUZZLE-DIMENSIONS:
- SIMPLEX, FLOWERGARDEN, GRIDPRYZM, RADIASTAR,
- COLORTEMPLE, STARLOCK, COREONE, CORETWO.
~ 12 STEAM-ACHIEVEMENTS.
~ 72 CHALLENGING VARIATIONS to BOXiGON~MASTER!


INSTRUCTIONS:
~ Align colors with ORBS.
~ Click TILE to SWAP positions.
~ Click ORB to see solutions.
~ HINTS show in the lower-left.

ALSO:
~ Look for BONUS~POINTS!
~ Gradually challenging difficulty.
~ And solve your way to BOXiGON~MASTER!

WARNING:
Flashing lights: special care was taken to reduce flashing lights. Warning: low fidelity visual explosions.
Color blindness: game does not include color-blind options. Please let us know if color-blind mode benefits you and ~E will update.

CONTACT US:
Please give your feedback and support on twitter at BOXiGON.
BOXiGONV2 in the works!

Thank you for playing. ~E-.: )
